description: Two balls, A and B, are on an infinitely long, smooth plane. Ball A has a mass of 5 kg, and Ball B has a mass of 2 kg. Ball A starts from the origin and moves uniformly along the x-axis at a speed of 4 m/s. Ball B is placed at rest 10 m from the origin. When the two balls collide, they bounce off each other completely elastically.
